H0.text: They can be tested at the same time is the advantage of making several different prototypes for a company that is developing a new computer system.

H1.text: They can be produced in large numbers is an advantage of making several different prototypes for a company developing a new computer system.

H2.text: They will be bought by many different users is an advantage of making several different prototypes for a new computer system.

H3.text: They will be sold for more than they cost to build are an advantage of making several different prototypes for a company making prototypes for a new computer system.

A4.text: In general, it can be expected that individual prototype costs will be substantially greater than the final production costs due to inefficiencies in materials and processes.

A5.text: When applied early in the development stage, significant cost savings are possible.

A6.text: Iterative design is a design methodology based on a cyclic process of prototyping, testing, analyzing, and refining a product or process.
